content: meet the cedar headband a warm wide ear warmer knit completely in the round so there s no sewing at all the evergreen tree texture wraps all the way around for a simple woodland-inspired look that s much easier than it appears the pattern includes child small adult and large adult sizes and uses worsted weight yarn on size 7 4 5mm circular needles a stitch chart and written instructions are both included perfect for quick gifts winter walks and anyone who prefers an ear warmer over a full hat
